name: df-pellfund
body: |- wceq(cpellfund, cmpt(s0, cdif(cn, csquarenn), cinf(crab(s1, cfv(cpell14qr, cv(s0)), wbr(nat1, clt, cv(s1))), cr, clt)))
comment: A function mapping Pell discriminants to the corresponding fundamental solution. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Sep-2014.) (Revised by AV, 17-Sep-2020.)
